name: Breakyourvoice
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: break your voice
des:
For some reason Alexa has trouble repeating sounds and eventually they make her voice break apart.

Just start this skill by saying "Alexa, break your voice." She will try to say five thousand zeroes in a row, and very quickly she will eventually lose all control, resulting in a bunch of rapid, overlapping syllables.

You can also interrupt her with the phrase "Alexa, information," if you want more details on how this works.

Enjoy!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
